name: Lux
title: the Lady of Luminosity
lore: Luxanna Crownguard hails from Demacia, an insular realm where magical abilities are viewed with fear and suspicion. Able to bend light to her will, she grew up dreading discovery and exile, and was forced to keep her power secret, in order to preserve her family's noble status. Nonetheless, Lux's optimism and resilience have led her to embrace her unique talents, and she now covertly wields them in service of her homeland.
blurb: Luxanna Crownguard hails from Demacia, an insular realm where magical abilities are viewed with fear and suspicion. Able to bend light to her will, she grew up dreading discovery and exile, and was forced to keep her power secret, in order to preserve...
allytips: Lux has great zone control abilities. Try to set up Lucent Singularity to prevent an enemy's advance or escape.
If you have trouble landing Prismatic Barrier, remember that it returns to you after it reaches max range. Try positioning yourself to hit your allies with its return trip.
Lucent Singularity is a great scouting tool. Try throwing it into brush before walking into it to check for ambushes.
enemytips: Lux has powerful zone control abilities. Try to spread out and attack from different directions so she cannot lock down a specific area.
When retreating with low health, be prepared to dodge Lux's Final Spark, a red targeting beam fires prior to the main beam, so try to move to the side if possible.

riot_spell_q.name: Light Binding
riot_spell_q.description: Lux releases a sphere of light that binds and deals damage to up to two enemy units.
riot_spell_q.tooltip: Fires a ball of light, rooting up to two enemies for {{ e3 }} seconds and dealing {{ e1 }} <scaleAP>(+{{ a1 }})</scaleAP> magic damage to each.

riot_spell_w.name: Prismatic Barrier
riot_spell_w.description: Lux throws her wand and bends the light around any friendly target it touches, protecting them from enemy damage.
riot_spell_w.tooltip:
Throws Lux's wand in target direction, shielding her and all allied Champions it touches from {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) damage for 3 seconds.

Upon reaching its destination, it returns to Lux, shielding her and all allied Champions it touches for an additional {{ effect2amount*2.0 }} (+{{ charabilitypower2.0 }}) damage for 3 seconds.

riot_spell_e.name: Lucent Singularity
riot_spell_e.description: Fires an anomaly of twisted light to an area, which slows nearby enemies. Lux can detonate it to damage enemies in the area of effect.
riot_spell_e.tooltip:
Creates a zone that slows enemies by {{ e1 }}%. After {{ e3 }} seconds the zone detonates dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

Activate again to detonate early.

riot_spell_r.name: Final Spark
riot_spell_r.description: After gathering energy, Lux fires a beam of light that deals damage to all targets in the area. If Final Spark helps take down a champion, part of its cooldown is refunded. In addition, triggers Lux's passive ability and refreshes the Illumination debuff duration.
riot_spell_r.tooltip:
Fires a dazzling ray of light dealing {{ totaldamage }} magic damage to all enemies in a line. Enemy champions that die within {{ resetassistwindow }} seconds of being hit by Final Spark refund {{ resetpercent*100 }}% of its cooldown.

Final Spark ignites and refreshes the Illumination debuff.

riot_spell_i.name: Illumination
riot_spell_i.description: Lux's damaging spells charge the target with energy for 6 seconds. Lux's next attack ignites the energy, dealing bonus magic damage (depending on Lux's level) to the target.

wikia_skill_i1.name: Illumination
wikia_skill_i1.blurb: Lux's damaging spells charge the target with energy for 6 seconds. Lux's next attack ignites the energy, dealing bonus magic damage (depending on Lux's level) to the target.
wikia_skill_i1.description: {{sbc|Innate:}} Damaging enemies with [[Champion ability|abilities]] marks them with light energy for 6 seconds.
wikia_skill_i1.description2: Her [[basic attack]]s and {{ai|Final Spark|Lux}} consume the mark, dealing {{pp|20 to 190}} {{as|(+ 20% AP)}} {{tip|magic damage|{{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}}}}.

wikia_skill_q1.name: Light Binding
wikia_skill_q1.blurb: Lux releases a sphere of light that binds and deals damage to up to two enemy units.
wikia_skill_q1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Lux''' releases a sphere of light in a line that deals {{as|magic damage}} to the first two enemies hit and {{tip|root|roots}} them for 2 seconds.
wikia_skill_q1.notes: * Targets affected by a {{tip|spell shield}} or by {{ai|Black Shield|Morgana}} count towards ''Light Binding's'' two-target limit.

wikia_skill_w1.name: Prismatic Barrier
wikia_skill_w1.blurb: Lux throws her wand and bends the light around any friendly target it touches, protecting them from enemy damage.
wikia_skill_w1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Lux''' launches her wand in the target direction which returns to her after reaching maximum range.
wikia_skill_w1.description2: The outgoing wand {{tip|shield|shields}} '''Lux''' and all allied champions it touches for 3 seconds.
wikia_skill_w1.description3: The returning wand shields for twice the amount, for the same duration, while also stacking with the outgoing shield and resetting its duration.
wikia_skill_w1.description4: ''The shields can only stack up to 2 times. Additional shields will neither reset the duration nor strengthen it.''
wikia_skill_w1.notes:
* If ''Lux'' dies before her wand changes direction it will fizzle upon reaching maximum range.
* ''Lux's'' wand decelerates on the way out and accelerates on the way back.

wikia_skill_e1.name: Lucent Singularity
wikia_skill_e1.blurb: Fires an anomaly of twisted light to an area, which slows nearby enemies. Lux can detonate it to damage enemies in the area of effect.
wikia_skill_e1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Lux''' sends an anomaly of twisted light to the target area, {{tip|slow|slowing}} nearby enemies and granting {{tip|sight}} of the area around it for up to 5 seconds.
wikia_skill_e1.description2: At the end of the duration or if ''Lucent Singularity'' is activated again, the singularity detonates, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to all enemies in the area.
wikia_skill_e1.notes:
* '''Lux''' can re-cast ''Lucent Singularity'' in flight to detonate on arrival.
* ''Lucent Singularity'' grants {{tip|sight}} while in flight and while on the ground.
* The slow lingers for {{fd|0.25}} seconds after leaving the area of effect and after detonation.
* If ''Lux'' dies while ''Lucent Singularity'' is on the field or in flight, it will remain for the full duration and cannot be detonated early.

wikia_skill_r1.name: Final Spark
wikia_skill_r1.blurb: After gathering energy, Lux fires a beam of light that deals damage to all targets in the area. If Final Spark kills a champion, part of its cooldown is refunded. In addition, triggers Lux's passive ability and refreshes the Illumination debuff duration.
wikia_skill_r1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Lux''' winds up for 1 second to fire a giant laser in a line that deals {{as|magic damage}} to all enemies hit, briefly {{tip|sight|revealing}} them as well as the surrounding area.
wikia_skill_r1.description2: If ''Final Spark'' hits at least one enemy champion that dies within {{fd|1.75}} seconds, a percentage of its maximum cooldown is refunded.
wikia_skill_r1.notes:
* '''Lux''' cannot use any ability, summoner spell, or activate any item while casting.
* '''Lux''' can reactivate {{ai|Lucent Singularity|Lux}} while casting her ultimate.
* If '''Lux''' is {{tip|airborne|displaced}} while casting, ''Final Spark'' will fire from her original location.
* ''Final Spark'' only goes on cooldown when it fires and not when '''Lux''' starts casting. If she dies while casting, ''Final Spark'' will not go on cooldown.
